titleStmt.title: To the honourable knights, cittizens and burgesses, of the Commons House of Parliament. The humble petition of the lords knights and gentlemen of the Kingdome of Ireland now in towne, ...
titleStmt.author: Loftus of Ely, Adam Loftus, Viscount, 1568-1643.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Adam Viscount Loftus [and 20 others].
Gives an account of the destruction of 40 years' labours and of the urgent need of immediate succour. Urges that the 10,000 Scots be sent at once to Ulster. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
